about: My name is Mohammad Jamali and I was born on July 6 of 2004, in Tabriz, a city in South Azerbaijan. I am a highly motivated and passionate self-taught front-end developer with experience building websites and web applications using frameworks such as React, Preact, and Next.
languages: Additionally, I am a self-taught polyglot who speaks English, Turkish, Azeri, and Persian fluently.
